description: Firiel`s childhood friend as well as her father`s student and assistant. He protects Firiel throughout the series and is obviously enamoured by her. In the start of the series, Firiel looks at him more like a little brother, though they later develop a serious relationship. His past is troubled and shrouded in darkness as he later tells Firiel that he cannot be with her for that reason because to him she "shines like the sun itself".
name: Roux Liskin
